channel.title: CVE Feed for Custom Post Type Relations -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Custom Post Type Relations -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34654|2024-08-04T00:19:47.451Z -- custom%20post%20type%20relations -- custom%20post%20type%20relations
item.description: The Custom Post Type Relations WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the cptr[name] parameter found in the ~/pages/admin-page.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.
